segments.text: I am disgusted by the mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're making it worse by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to clean up this mess myself, it's so frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just take care of their kitchen and be safe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is really getting on my nerves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a lack of responsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR
